item.title: Consultant Growth Track
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: While there is no fixed path in the consulting field, we do have a structured growth guidance for career development, skill enhancement, and professional advancement.

item.title: Consulting - How we work
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our Approach: Collaborative Expertise Team of Specialists: we favor collective expertise, encouraging knowledge sharing and collaboration, to craft innovative solutions that exceed expectations.

item.title: Consulting - Who should join us
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Consulting teams consists of anyone who’s hungry for more than just coding; those who are curious about the trends, the market, who can introduce new projects / challenges, who care about providing sensible solutions, and who take great care of projects.

item.title: Consulting - Who We Are
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Who we are Dwarves Consulting is team of individuals who possess a combination of technical expertise, problem-solving skills, and strong communication abilities.

item.title: Dwarves Community
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Dwarves Community is melting pot for software engineers, thinkers, learners and techies who are to explore, learn and master the latest advancements in technology.

item.title: Changelog
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This is our newsletter page, where we keep you up to date with latest industry news and updates, valuable content from our engineers at Dwarves, and a picture of how we operate with our engineers and community.

item.title: Events
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This page holds a collection of both our internal and external events, including the things we do with the Labs team, Consulting team, Operations, team, and the community.

item.title: Home
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Welcome to Dwarves Notes, a collection of notes for everything we do and operate at Dwarves. Dwarves are a group of technology innovation advocates.

item.title: Dwarves Memo
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our newest memos This is where we keep our internal updates, learned and curated by our engineers.

item.title: WeAreHiring
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: WeAreHiring Careers Marketing Marketing Lead Engineering Backend Engineer, Go/Elixir/Rust Web Developer, React.js App Developer, Apple Platform QA Engineer, Automation QA Engineer, Manual Data Engineer AI/ML Engineer Engineering Manager Design UX Designer (Blockchain/Fintech) UX Designer (Productivity/Dev Tool) UI Designer Lead Designer Apprenticeship Training Program (1+ year exp.

item.title: DuckDB demo and showcase
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Event Date Discord Channel Type 23/11/2023 üéô„Éªlabs-stage Internal DuckDB has been an emerging OLAP database for analytical needs. Use cases for analytics usually use around 1GB-10GB of data, not enough to take advantage of the full potential of databases in data warehouses.

item.title: How R&D contributes to Performance Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our organization values the research and development (R&D) efforts of our team members and aims to incorporate these contributions into performance reviews.

item.title: Knowledge Journey
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our process for evaluating and integrating technology is designed to be thorough yet efficient, ensuring we adopt only the most effective tools into our operations.

item.title: December Forward Engineering 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This month, we have focused on revamping how we learn, familiarize, and work with tech. We are excited to announce that we have updated our Forward Engineering to better reflect the feedback and insights from our Labs team, Operations Team, and Consulting Team.

item.title: Where we work
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Where we work Office The Dwarves HQ is in Saigon, Vietnam. Fifty-ish people and two cats have desk space in the Saigon office, but those people also work from home regularly.
